about_the_game:
[b] If you are interested in the game and can provide valuable suggestions, we not only implement them into the game, but also pay for them, please contact us: ppp8300885@gmail.com\[/b]

"Survive Ten Days" is an open-world survival game in a post-apocalyptic setting, where players will face threats such as resource scarcity, zombies, and other survivors. Players must carefully manage limited resources, establish shelters, find food and water sources, and seek hope for survival in an ever-changing world. You will experience the interplay of despair and hope, explore the boundaries of human nature, and consider the possibility of rebuilding after the apocalypse.

Game background

  • Players play the role of a few survivors in the apocalypse and try their best to survive longer.

  • As time goes by, the rate of zombie generation will increase, reaching its peak after 10 days.

  • Advanced special zombies will be randomly refreshed. These zombies are highly threatening, please pay more attention to them.

  • After the house/base is cleared, it will turn into a safe state and no zombies will be generated in the short term.

  • All materials will be automatically refreshed after 2 days of searching, and camp tasks will also be refreshed after 2 days.

  • Faction bases can be traded. Completing tasks can increase favorability. When the favorability reaches 100, NPCs can be controlled. Hostile camps will launch attacks.

  • The faction will disappear when the population reaches 0, and will be randomly repopulated in a safe base after that.

Character

  • Character professions can be freely chosen, and each profession has different skill focuses.

  • Each character can choose up to three personalities, and the character's appearance can be customized

  • Each character has different initial equipment, but the initial weapons are all pistols

Operating instructions

  • Movement: WASD movement, SHIRT key to run, SPACE key to climb, CTRL to crouch/recover to stand

  • Viewing angle: Hold down the left mouse button to rotate the viewing angle, and use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out.

  • Interaction: Pointing the mouse at an interactive item will highlight the object/character. Press and hold E to open the box, and short press E to engage in character dialogue.

  • Items: Press I key can open the backpack, Press M key can open the map, and the number 123 key can quickly select the corresponding weapon.

  • Combat: After equipping a weapon, press the right button of the mouse to enter aiming mode, and the left button of the mouse to attack

  • Others: Press the F key to turn on the flashlight

About game experience

The game is currently in the testing stage. If you encounter bugs, you can contact the author. Your support is the best encouragement for the author. Thanks!

content_descriptors.notes: "Survival Ten Days" is an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic scenario. Players have to utilize limited resources to build shelters, find food and water sources, and seek hope for survival in a dynamically changing world over a period of ten days. The game features a top-down perspective where players use various weapons (pistols, machine guns, melee weapons) to attack and eliminate zombies, with bloody scenes during combat. The game does not involve sexual acts, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
